add2blog 0.1.6
  • Reference
  • Changelog

add2blog

The goal of add2blog is to help you build some materials like wall paper for your blog website !

Installation

You can install the released version of add2blog from Github with:

devtools::install_github('JiaxiangBU/add2blog')
library(add2blog)

Usage

library(add2blog)
#> Warning: replacing previous import 'data.table::first' by 'dplyr::first'
#> when loading 'add2blog'
#> Warning: replacing previous import 'data.table::between' by
#> 'dplyr::between' when loading 'add2blog'
#> Warning: replacing previous import 'data.table::last' by 'dplyr::last' when
#> loading 'add2blog'
#> Warning: replacing previous import 'dplyr::collapse' by 'glue::collapse'
#> when loading 'add2blog'
library(tidyverse)
#> ─ Attaching packages ────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ─
#> ✔ ggplot2 3.1.0     ✔ purrr   0.2.5
#> ✔ tibble  1.4.2     ✔ dplyr   0.7.8
#> ✔ tidyr   0.8.2     ✔ stringr 1.3.1
#> ✔ readr   1.1.1     ✔ forcats 0.3.0
#> ─ Conflicts ──────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ─
#> ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
#> ✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
png2gif(
path = file.path('../','inst')
,input_like = 'reprex'
,output_name = 'reprex201811061210.gif'
)
